content.rendered:
If an urgent medical problem occurs after Student Health Services has closed for the day, students should request assistance from the on-call resident advisor or report to the nearest emergency department for care. Please see below for contact information and addresses.

Emergency Phone Numbers
Emergency Medical Service 911
Campus Safety
(From Campus Telephones)		 (909) 448-4950
Pomona Valley Health Centers Urgent Care
2333 Foothill Blvd.
La Verne, CA 91750
Please call for specific hours of operation		 (909) 392-6501
Pomona Valley Hospital Medical Center
1798 N. Garey Ave
Pomona, CA 91767		 (909) 865-9500
University Counseling Center Ext. #4105
